page.title: 13NENTHEAD HEALTH & WELFARE
page.content: There are two full-time general pract- itioners based at Alston who hold surgeries in Nenthead three mornings per week.Minor injuries can be treated at Alston Cottage Hospital,but people with serious injuries have to be taken to Carlisle Hospital for treatment. There is a dentist based in Penrith <25 mls away> who holds a surgery in Alston Cottage Hospital one morning a week.Free transport is provided from Nenthead.Some patients need to travel to the better equipped Penrith surgery A Health Visitor lives in the village and she covers all the Alston Moor area. Meals on Wheels are provided for the old people at a reduced price two days a week. An ambulance based at Moredun Garage is always on standby for emergencies. Fire-engines have to come from Alston.
